name: Plenty of Fish
description:
A Bitsy tale about a homosexual fish that wants to get laid. The story follows Trouty, a gay fish that is horny and didn't get laid recently. Trouty goes to the opening night with his friends to a new club that is on the edge of his city.

The story is loosely inspired by real events.

Use WASD or Arrow keys to move around and interact with characters.
